msg: TUSCANY-2391, apply lates patch from   Thilina Buddhika

author: indika
msg: add commons-cli , this is needed for cipertool and this jar will not be included in the binary distribution

author: sjlee
msg: Instead of a shared member variable, introduced it as a thread local.  This retains the original intention for optimization, but makes it thread safe by not sharing instances in multiple threads.

author: sjlee
msg: Removed the exception.printStackTrace() call along with the try-catch clause.  This causes the CharacterCodingException to bubble up to the protocol codec filter, and it results in a ProtocolEncoderException, which is the appropriate behavior.
